document_name: http://www.ug.undp.org/content/dam/uganda/img/About Uganda/About Uganda/About Uganda/Country Programme Action Plan (CPAP).pdf

outputs.output_descr: Project Initiation Plan (PIP) is developed with twin objectives of undertaking key and immediate interventions that lay foundations for long term peace and stability in the country in the form of developing a credible infrastructure for peace.

project_descr: Initial Plan is itended to support critical start up activities associated with UNDP Uganda support to development of an impartial and independent platform for internal dialogue and mediation on key national issues. Secondly, initial plan is
